newsitem.title: USA: ABC withdraws from Roseanne series talks - NYT.
newsitem.headline: ABC withdraws from Roseanne series talks - NYT.

text.p: Walt Disney's ABC has withdrawn from negotiations for a new television show designed to be a spinoff of the popular series "Roseanne", the New York Times said on Friday.
According to executives close to negotiations between Carsey-Werner Productions, which produces "Roseanne," the new series would find a new network home, the paper said.
One executive familiar with the talks said the show, which would not be called "Roseanne", would find a different network "within a matter of days," the newspaper said.
For a time, "Roseanne" was the highest-rated show on television but its ratings have declined in recent years, the newspaper said.
ABC was unwilling to pay the price asked for by the production company and allowed its option on the new series to collapse, the Times said, citing executives.
